sentences.english: Peishan asks Zhenghong to join in her plan to take revenge on Jinlong and Mingzhang.
sentences.chinese: 佩珊邀正鴻加入計劃向金龍和明章報仇。

sentences.english: Zaitian takes back Xin Fu and decides to start from scratch with the help of Zhenghong and the rest.
sentences.chinese: 再添決定拿回新富，與正鴻和衆多朋友從新開始。

sentences.english: The latest album of Li Jianhong, "The Brief History of Time" is released by Post-concrete Records, U. S.

sentences.english: The underground continuous wall has been adopted in the foundation pit support of the super high building of Hongji Commercial and Trade Center.

sentences.english: Jinlong, now a wanted man, secretly attends the wedding of Jiahui and Zhenghong.
sentences.chinese: 金龍悄悄地出席佳慧與正鴻的婚禮。

sentences.english: Only HONGWEI's search consultants may have access to your information and aspirations.
sentences.chinese: 只有鴻爲的搜尋顧問可能接觸你的信息和願望。

sentences.english: The fifth chapter discourses upon the influence hi literature by Hong-Du Men Xue and Cao' family tradition.
sentences.chinese: 第五章探討鴻都門學與曹氏家風對文學的影響。
